title: ping before game
body: Is there any way to check your ping before you queue?  usually my ping is fine, but I just had a game with 120ms and lost badly, there is no way to see what your ping is before you queue at which point if it's terrible you're just hurting your team. If I knew I was on 120 I wouldn't have played. It can't be hard to add a ping meter somewhere in the pre game UI can it?  Seems like a pretty easy win.

replies.body:
Hey friendlyFerret,

If you need to check your ping before a session, you can always open up a custom match! Once you've checked your ping, you can close out of the custom match and queue up if there aren't any issues!
